backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing video metadata, chunks, shorts, user profiles, mood preferences, and access control with admin/user-restricted methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components related to implementing a light/dark mode toggle via next-themes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text file summarizing key frontend source files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utilities with OKLCH theme tokens and dark-mode variable overrides.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and mounting root for the SPA.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web App Manifest configuring PWA metadata, icons, colors, categories, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and exclusions for IC API and video files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wiring TanStack Router, React Query, next-themes ThemeProvider, routes, and PWA service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileM: Renders a profile dropdown menu with avatar, navigation links, upload options, theme toggle, and sign‑out handling based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/account/ThemeTog: Provides dropdown menu items for switching between light, dark, and system themes with visual selection indicators.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icon links highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Displays a channel header with avatar, stats, and follow button, with a skeleton state for loading.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Renders a comment list and input form with identity-based posting and local state updates.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Button that toggles follow state with simulated API delay and identity login fallback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search, notifications, and profile menu, supporting mobile search mode.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, sidebar, main content outlet, bottom nav, and PWA prompt.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Shows a notifications dropdown with unread count, icons per notification type, timestamp formatting, and actions to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Displays a dialog for editing user profile details including basic info, bio, images, and social links, with save handling.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Detects installability and shows a dismissible PWA install prompt, with special handling for iOS.
frontend/src/components/settings/MoodAIS: Manages Mood AI preferences, allowing signed‑in users to enable the feature and select a mood, with loading and update states.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation listing main app routes with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card showing video thumbnail, metadata, and channel info linking to watch and channel pages.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Video player that streams chunks via actor API, showing loading progress, errors, or offline placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Implements chunked video uploading with progress tracking, cancellation, retry logic, and backend actor integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodSignals.ts: Tracks user engagement signals locally and infers a mood based on watch time, likes, and activity, with methods to update and reset signals.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads and stores user-specific notifications in localStorage, seeding defaults and providing helpers to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as videos, metadata, shorts, and user preferences, with placeholders for unimplemented calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light and dark modes, and utility classes like scrollbar hiding and safe-area padding.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Exports UI copy strings related to following channels, including labels, page text, and a follower count formatter.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/videoFileMetadata.ts: Extracts video metadata such as duration, resolution, and MIME type by loading the file in a hidden video element with a timeout fallback.
frontend/src/lib/videoStreamSource.ts: Implements a video chunk streaming helper that fetches chunks from the backend and assembles them into a blob URL for playback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a channel profile with editable fields, social links, and mock video listings, handling identity-based viewing and editing states.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows videos from followed channels or prompts sign‑in, using mock data for followed content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a static grid of mock featured videos.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Provides signed‑in users access to uploaded and liked videos using mock data, with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Implements a multi‑section settings UI managing general, playback, privacy, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Displays vertical shorts with mood‑based recommendations, scroll‑based playback, and watch/like tracking.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Handles authenticated video uploads with metadata extraction, chunked upload, progress display, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortPage.tsx: Short upload page that enforces 60‑second limit, handles video metadata extraction, and submits uploads after Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Video watch page showing player, metadata, likes/dislikes, comments, and mood‑signal tracking with offline detection.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers, unregisters, and checks service worker/PWA status with update handling and error logging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, known issues, and generated assets for the mytube app.
